League 1
Rennes: concern for G√©lin
Rennes defender J√©r√©my G√©lin, injured, will not play against N√Æmes tonight (20 hours) as part of the 12th day of Ligue 1.
02 Nov 2019, 12:40 by Hugo Deloraine



Julien St√©phan has decided not to summon his defender, J√©r√©my G√©lin, during the trip from Rennes to N√Æmes on Saturday, November 2nd at 8 pm for this 12 th day of Ligue 1. The reason? An injury contracted during the training of the Bretons.




G√©lin, preserved




J√©r√©my G√©lin + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Indeed, on a support recovery, he felt a gene behind a knee, says L'Equipe. Not preferring to take risks, his trainer decided to spare him and call Gerzino Nyamsi in his place. As a reminder, Jeremy Gelin has played eight games as a holder with Stade Rennais this season.
